name: AH-64D Longbow
description:
AH-64D Longbow is a simulation game developed by Origin Systems and Jane's Combat Simulations. It came out on 01-01-1996. It was published by Electronic Arts.
You can play AH-64D Longbow on PC.
Andy Hollis produced the game. It was directed by Will McBurnett. It was scored by Barry Leitch.
